name: C
title: C is a very powerful programing language. C is a general-purpose programming language. C is very versatile; it can be used in both applications and technologies.

name: C++
title: C++ is a popular programming language. C++ is used to create computer programs. and is one of the most used language in game development.

name: Java
title: Java is a secure programming language. Java is used to develop mobile apps, web apps, desktop apps, games and much more. Java works on different platforms.

name: JavaScript
title: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language. JavaScript is the programming language of the Web and server side also nowadays.

name: Python
title: Python has a simple syntax similar to the English language. It was created by Guido van Rossum, and released in 1991. Python works on different platforms.

name: PHP
title: PHP is a widely-used, free, and efficient alternative to competitors such as Microsoft's ASP. PHP code is executed on the server.
